title: Is Flightline the Greatest Thoroughbred Since Secretariat?
description: The 4-year-old colt is undefeated in five races, winning by an average of more than 10 lengths. The Breedersâ€™ Cup Classic on Saturday will be his first big moment in the spotlight.
dc:creator: Joe Drape
media:description: Flightline, with Flavien Prat up, winning the Metropolitan Mile at Belmont Park in June.
